CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Product_Type__c ,'LOAN'),ISPICKVAL(genesis__Product_Type__c ,'PACKAGE')) , genesis__Loan_Amount__c - genesis__SubLimit_Total__c , IF( ISPICKVAL(genesis__Product_Type__c ,'LEASE'), genesis__Financed_Amount__c - genesis__SubLimit_Total__c, genesis__Credit_Limit__c - genesis__SubLimit_Total__c))
CustomField.label: Sublimit Variance
